tests.report: - The website can be more accessible, but is rather good!
tests.report_a11y:
- Number of types of issues: 2 ( 4.60 rating )
- Number of issues: 2 ( 4.80 rating )

##### Problems:
- A textinput element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title undefined, aria-label undefined, aria-labelledby undefined.
- A form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.

data.message: This textinput element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title undefined, aria-label undefined, aria-labelledby undefined.
data.context: <input class="pagefind-ui__search-input svelte-e9gkc3" type="text" placeholder="Search" autocapitalize="none" enterkeyhint="search">

data.message: This form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.
